metadata.synopsis: She is the last line of defence to the roof of the tower during the assault on Moonrise. She yells this on her turn during combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start the assault on Moonrise (oe mooassault)Fight your way up the tower to 'Radija' (AccessCultist)Wait for her turn

0.speaker: Radija
0.text: You'll die before you reach my lord. Perhaps then you will be obedient.
0.context: NodeContext: Grim, angry. Promising to kill us and resurrect us as a more obedient slave.
